source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_00<tab>Bruvagnon is ready to say what is really on his mind.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_00<tab>聖アンダリム神学院のブリュヴァニョン副学長は、真実を明かそうとしているようだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_01<tab>Bruvagnon explains to you that those who strive for a favorable position within the Holy See must first graduate from the scholasticate with the highest marks─as one of the Trinity, or the top three seats which receive a formal endorsement. However, due to the revelations regarding Ishgard's history, both the curriculum and the traditional means of assessment are currently being reevaluated. Without a clear path to the Trinity, the students have grown disillusioned and angry, with some lashing out at their peers.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_01<tab>ブリュヴァニョン副学長に、学内に広がる対立を鎮めるよう依頼された。エルヴィアヌ学院長と面会するため、聖レマノー大聖堂の「神学院の助祭」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_02<tab>You meet with Headmistress Elviane and the other clergy of the scholasticate, who relay to you and Briardien their wealth of concerns. While they acknowledge that the uncertainty regarding the rankings is partially to blame, they posit it is but part of a larger problem─a fundamental crisis of faith. That being said, the headmistress and her administrators are quite concerned that some students may attempt to manipulate the interim evaluation system to their advantage. Therefore, the administration would have you and Briardien remain vigilant for any unscrupulous behavior that they might conduct a fair and equitable assessment of the graduating seniors.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_02<tab>エルヴィアヌ学院長と面会したところ、学内の対立を煽る黒幕を暴くよう依頼された。聖レマノー大聖堂の「ブリアルディアン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_03<tab>After the meeting with the headmistress, the soft-spoken clergyman introduces himself as Saturnois, a scholasticate instructor who often interacts with the underprivileged students of the seminary. Briardien surmises that it would be prudent to learn more about the students and their aspirations. Gaetelle and Saturnois suggest getting to know the students yourself, as they behave differently in the presence of their instructors. Gaetelle recommends starting with the dormitory prefect, Archombadin de Dzemael.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_03<tab>ブリアルディアンと話して、神学生の人間関係を調べることになった。聖アンダリム神学院の「アルションバダン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_04<tab>You speak with Archombadin de Dzemael and Lebrassoir de Bonfaurt, who express their opinions on the current turmoil in the Holy See, as well as their hope that the students of the scholasticate will rein in their impulses towards reformation. During your discussion, Archombadin mentions that Gaetelle has given them the task of guiding truant students back to their studies, and Briardien suspects others are doing the same.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_04<tab>アルションバダンと話した。神学生たちは、神学院に姿を見せなくなった神学生を復帰させる復学促進運動にあたっているようだ。その様子を探るために、イシュガルド上層で、聖アンダリム神学院の神学生たちと話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_05<tab>In your search for other students, you come across Theomocent and Leigh, who intend to go to Foundation to coax their friends back to their studies. Theomocent is hopeful that they will be able to find like-minded students to support their cause, while Leigh's attitude is less optimistic. During your observations, you also meet a highborn student surrounded by his female admirers. He introduces himself as Crammevoix de Maintigny, and appears to have done well in his efforts to persuade a fellow seminarian to return. During a conversation between the two about the nobles taking more responsibility in redressing the imbalance, the smiling seminarian mentions she was to pen a treatise─that is, until her primary text, volume eleven of the <var 1A 02 /var>Seventy-two Articles of Halonic Polity<var 1A 01 /var>, went missing. Nevertheless, she leaves to gather her things and return to the seminary, prompting Crammevoix to take his leave for a nap.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_05<tab>聖アンダリム神学院の神学生たちと話した。神学生たちは、それぞれの思いを抱き、復学促進運動を進めているようだ。聖アンダリム神学院の「ブリアルディアン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_06<tab>Gaetelle announces the results of the exercise, with Archombadin and Lebrassoir guiding back the most students to the scholasticate. Though present for the announcement, Crammevoix's name is not among those mentioned, and Archombadin soon makes it clear that the girl he was speaking with, Ulaa, has instead formally withdrawn from the scholasticate. Crammevoix is suspicious of Ulaa's sudden departure, mentioning the dormitory prefect's open disagreement with her views on equality. The quarrel between the highborn students escalates, in which Archombadin utters a biting comment about House Maintigny, prompting Crammevoix to leave. Upon witnessing the feud, Briardien suggests the girl's withdrawal is worthy of further investigation.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SEQ_06<tab>ブリアルディアンとともに、復学促進運動の結果を確認した。しかし、クラムヴォワが復帰させたはずの神学生ウラーが、なぜか退学していた。この結果に対して、ブリアルディアンは違和感を感じているようだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the scholasticate deacon at Saint Reymanaud's Cathedral.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_TODO_00<tab>聖レマノー大聖堂の神学院の助祭と話す

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Briardien.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_TODO_01<tab>ブリアルディアンと話す

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Archombadin in the scholasticate.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_TODO_02<tab>聖アンダリム神学院のアルションバダンと話す

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the students in the Pillars.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_TODO_03<tab>上層の神学生たちと話す

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Briardien in the scholasticate.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_TODO_04<tab>聖アンダリム神学院のブリアルディアンと話す

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_000<tab>I suspected there was more to this judging by how quickly we completed the investigation. No offense to your powers of deduction, of course.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_000さて、叔父上がぼくを呼び寄せた真の理由とやらを、
聞かせてもらおうじゃないか……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_000<tab>I had better start from the beginning. It would not do to involve <var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> with our affairs without first ensuring <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> possesses a proper understanding of how our seminary functions, and how we have been forced to change.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_000……君たちの真の使命を説明するためには、
神学生たちの、卒業後の進路について知っておく必要がある。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_001<tab>You see, most men and women of the cloth go on to live fulfilling lives as pastors, academics, and poets. However, those who graduate from the scholasticate with the highest marks are given an opportunity to serve in the Vault and perhaps one day rise to prominence.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_001ここ聖アンダリム神学院が、
イシュガルド正教の聖職者を育成することは知ってのとおり。
しかし、ひとことで聖職者といっても、実態はさまざま……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_002<tab>The stakes are quite high for those who seek such prestige, for they know full well that their academic performance may determine their future. It is they who strive for the top three seats that are granted the scholasticate's official endorsement: the Trinity.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_002修道会に属し、貧民に奉仕する者、辺境の集落に赴任する者、
そして、教皇庁に入り、高位聖職者の道に進む者……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_003<tab>And so those who wish to guide Ishgard's faithful spend their days cumulating marks through academic pursuits, while at the same time honing their skills to persuade others to share their interpretations of scripture.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_003確かに、高位聖職者と一介の修道士では雲泥の差だ。
教皇庁に入れば、皇都の政策をも左右する権力が手に入る。
……ふむ、「点数稼ぎ」が行き着くのは、そこか。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_004<tab>Up until now, it resulted in no more than the occasional lively debate, for the Holy See was ultimately responsible for dictating doctrine. Ranking was naturally determined by one's familiarity with said doctrine. However, in light of recent events, that is no longer an option.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_004そのとおりだ。
卒業時点の成績が、上位三席に含まれる者が、
教皇庁入りの推薦を受けることができるという伝統なのだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_005<tab>Simply put, we cannot currently assess their academic performance in the traditional manner, as a significant portion of the curriculum has been called into question. As a result, we have been forced to consider more...subjective methods.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_005もちろん、これまでは単純に成績を測れば良かった。
だが、正教の教義に疑問符がついた以上、今までのように、
成績だけをもって席次を決めるわけにはいかなくなった。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_006<tab>And in this time of uncertainty, students are wont to lash out at their peers, whom they fear will exploit this interim system to their advantage. Distressing, I suppose, but what does this have to do with us?
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_006明確な指標を失い、あいまいな評価に不安を覚え、
神学生たちの間に混乱が生じているというわけか……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_007<tab>I require your unparalleled skills of observation and deduction.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_007<tab>……そう、これこそ君たちが立ち向かう真の使命。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_010<tab>The only way to put an end to this bickering between students is to ensure, beyond a shadow of a doubt, that our interim evaluations are conducted in a fair and equitable manner.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_010イシュガルド正教そのものが揺らいでいるからこそ、
明日の正教を担う神学生たちは、団結する必要がある。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_011<tab>I ask you to stand as an observer. Until a new curriculum is decided, our evaluation system is vulnerable.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_011ゆえに君たちの真の使命とは、学内に広がる対立の鎮静化。
神学生同士が衝突していては、民の心を鎮めることなど、
夢のまた夢だからな……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_012<tab>In other words, you want us to catch the cheaters.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_012なるほど、聖アンダリム神学院は、
今や外部と内部の両方から、蝕まれているというわけか。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_013<tab>Precisely. Now then. I have received word that the headmistress has returned to her office in the cathedral. I would ask that you introduce yourselves.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_013……そういうことだ。
詳しくは学院長のエルヴィアヌ様から、直接、聞いてほしい。
準備ができたら、「神学院の助祭」に声をかけてくれ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_014<tab>But there is something you should keep in mind when speaking with Headmistress Elviane. She was appointed to her position by the former archbishop, thus her views on the curriculum are quite traditional. I would advise you to discuss matters regarding the Holy See with the utmost care.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_014ただし、エルヴィアヌ様は前教皇の就任前から、
学院長を務められている、伝統を重んじる厳格なお方だ。
くれぐれも粗相のないように……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_019<tab>Although Uncle said we should speak with care, we would be remiss in our duties if we refrained from asking difficult questions. I trust you agree.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_019エルヴィアヌ学院長が、伝統を重んじる守旧派であれば、
今の状況は、決して面白くはないだろうな……。
少し鎌をかけてみるか。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_DOORMANHEADMASTER_000_020<tab>We have been expecting you. The headmistress awaits you within.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_DOORMANHEADMASTER_000_020……揃われたようですね。
エルヴィアヌ様は「学院長室」におられます。
こちらへどうぞ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_020<tab>Headmistress Elviane, may I have the pleasure to introduce the individuals who shall be in charge of keeping order at the scholasticate. This is Consulting Inspector Briardien and his associate, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_020エルヴィアヌ学院長……
彼らが、学院内の混乱を収拾するために召喚した、
事件屋と英雄殿です。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ELVIANE_000_021<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>? I must say, Father Bruvagnon, your selections are rather...appropriate. Ahem. We thank you both for your service in our time of need.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ELVIANE_000_021ご足労いただき感謝します。
副学長の強い勧めで、お二方の力をお借りしたいと思います。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ELVIANE_000_022<tab>I trust that Father Bruvagnon has briefed you on our humble seminary. Saint Endalim's Scholasticate has produced Ishgard's finest clergy for centuries, including countless men and women who have served in the highest echelons of the Holy See.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ELVIANE_000_022聖アンダリム神学院は、
教皇庁を導く高位聖職者たちを、数多く輩出してきました。
すなわち、神学院が教皇による統治を支えてきたということ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_023<tab>All of whom were spared a brutal death on the battlefield, in service to a misguided war they perpetuated. Or so some might be given to say.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_023あえて悪意に満ちた見方をすれば……
偽りの教義によって人々を戦争に動員するのを、
助けたことになりましょうな。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ELVIANE_000_024<tab>Indeed some might─and they would not be entirely mistaken. For while we were wholly unaware of the deception perpetuated by the archbishops, we did unwittingly sustain it, to our sorrow.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ELVIANE_000_024ええ、我らもまた、真実を知らされていなかったことなど、
騙されたと怒る民の耳には届かないのでしょう。
もはや理屈ではないのです……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ELVIANE_000_025<tab>The idea that we willingly subjected them to false precepts is, of course, preposterous─a contrived fantasy. Nevertheless, some fervently believe it true, and these selfsame individuals have come to view our instructors and students as targets for their misguided anger.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ELVIANE_000_025民は、怒りのもっとも簡単なはけ口として、
身近にいて、力のない者を求めました。
それが神学院であり、生徒たちなのです。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ELVIANE_000_026<tab>It is of paramount importance that we restore faith in the teachings. Yet how are we to regain the trust of the common man when our own seminarians are embroiled in childish quarrels?
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ELVIANE_000_026よって、今すべきは、民の信頼を取り戻すこと……
神学院が率先して正教の立て直しに挑むことでしょう。
そのためにこそ、一丸になるべきだというのに……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_027<tab>You refer to this tension regarding the interim evaluation system.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_027席次を巡る「点数稼ぎ」で、
神学生の対立が激化しているようですね。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_028<tab>Quite frankly, it is but one facet. Classes have also been suspended until we complete our own painstaking review of the curriculum. Some students have taken leave, while the more dedicated have taken it upon themselves to conduct independent work to demonstrate their merits.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRUVAGNON_000_028根本が揺らいだままの状況では、
既存の教義だけで、授業を続けるわけにはいかない。
そこで、生徒たちに奉仕活動を奨励したのだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_029<tab>We cannot allow this situation to continue indefinitely. Graduation is approaching, and we must make our recommendations. But the senior class is divided. They know not how they will be evaluated.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_029ところが、いつの間にやら卒業席次の評価に、
奉仕活動が直結すると受け取られてしまいました。
結果、生徒同士が徒党を組み、争いだしたのです……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SATURNOIS_000_030<tab>(-Soft-spoken Priest-)Rather, they understand <var 1A 02 /var>how<var 1A 01 /var> they will be evaluated, but have no faith that our methods will produce a fair result─a concern not without merit, I must confess. I too suspect that some may be driven to manipulate the interim system to their advantage.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SATURNOIS_000_030(-柔和そうな司祭-)確かに、授業が行えない以上、
奉仕活動の成果を評価として頼らざるをえないのは事実です。
しかし、この対立の進み方には、異常なものがあります。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ELVIANE_000_031<tab>I expect some have already tried. But that is why we have brought in outside observers. Inspector Briardien, <var 29 EB02 /var>, if anyone is engaging in unscrupulous behavior, I should have it brought to an end at once. May the Fury guide you in your task.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ELVIANE_000_031何者かが、裏から対立を煽っているのではないか……
その疑念についても、お二方には調べていただきたいのです。
くれぐれも慎重に……よろしくお願いいたしますよ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_039<tab>Surely one who desires to join the clergy would not be foolish enough to stoop to such behavior. The Fury knows all and sees all.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_039人を癒し導く聖職者を目指す身でありながら、
不安に駆られて徒党を組むなど……実にふがいない話です。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SATURNOIS_000_039<tab>So the headmistress also thinks some of the students have attempted to cheat...
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SATURNOIS_000_039<tab>学内の対立を煽る者など、本当にいるのでしょうか？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_040<tab>Now then, before we proceed, might you both tell us a little about your students, Father...?
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_040捜査を始める前に、まずは神学生たちの主要な顔ぶれと、
力関係を把握したいところだな……。
教員であるあなた方からも、少し話を聞かせてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SATURNOIS_000_041<tab>M-My apologies. I am Father Saturnois. In addition to teaching the fundamentals of Halonic polity, I also oversee fund-raising for the stipends of underprivileged students.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SATURNOIS_000_041(-サテュールノワ-)は、はい……。
私は、主に平民出身の神学生たちの指導を担当している、
サテュールノワと申します。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SATURNOIS_000_042<tab>While I would like to help you, I think my opinion would not do them justice; I would suggest getting to know them yourselves.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SATURNOIS_000_042(-サテュールノワ-)調査をお手伝いしたいのは山々ですが……。
私自身、赴任して間もないため、恥ずかしながら、
神学生の詳しい関係性までは把握しきれておりません。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_043<tab>I feel the same. The way in which pupils speak in front of their instructors is not the same as amongst themselves. In my ten years of counseling, they have minded their etiquette and are naught but cordial to me.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_043私は、貴族出身の神学生を指導して10年以上になりますが、
関係を調べるなら、直接、学生に確認することをお勧めします。
学友の前と教員の前では、異なる顔を見せるものですから。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_044<tab>However, I can recommend one of my students who is quite vocal. Mayhap you try speaking with the dormitory prefect, Archombadin? Given his closeness to the students' social affairs, he may also be able to give you insight into what they talk about.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_044まず声をかけるなら、入学以来、首席の座にあり続け、
学生寮の長も務める「アルションバダン」がいいでしょう。
学内の行事などを取り仕切る、中心的な人物です。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_045<tab>Archombadin? Ah yes, the silver-haired boy─a son of House Dzemael, as I recall. We shall heed your suggestion, Sister Gaetelle, given his duty and status.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_045聞いたことのある名だ……
確か、ゼーメル家の子息だったな。
ともかく、さっそく彼を訪ねてみるとしよう。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_049<tab>While I have little interest in noble bloodlines, I am not unfamiliar with the Count de Dzemael's sons.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_049「アルションバダン」の名は、社交界で聞いたことがある。
確か、ゼーメル家の子息のひとりだったはずだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_049<tab>So Leigh's lackey is helping the inspector now?
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_049<tab>貴方が、ブリアルディアン様の助手の……？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_050<tab>Has no one ever told you that brandishing weapons is <var 1A 02 /var>frowned upon<var 1A 01 /var> in places of enlightenment? That is, unless Leigh has sent you to stir up more trouble?
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_050ハッ、また部外者か……。
静寂であるべき正教の学び舎が、
最近は騒がしくてかなわない……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_051<tab>Rest assured that my associate inspector draws <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> armaments only to resolve troublesome situations, not create them. We merely came to ask of your well-being and your expectations for the future.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_051新たな特別顧問の)) (( )) 02 /var>だ。
ぼくたちは、学内の問題を解決するために招聘された。
協力してもらえれば、君の望みも自ずとかなうだろう。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_052<tab>Under the auspices of the headmistress, I am sure. Very well. I, Lebrassoir de Bonfaurt of House Bonfaurt, in service to House Dzemael, present to you Archombadin de Dzemael.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_052でしたら、真っ先にここに赴かれたのは的確なご判断です。
寮長も務めるアルションバダン・ゼーメルが、
当神学院の諸活動を実質的に指揮していますから。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_053<tab>As prefects for the scholasticate dormitory, we are responsible for keeping the peace between our fellow seminarians.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_053そして、私は寮長を補佐しているルブラソワールです。
ゼーメル家とは、遠い親戚にあたります。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_100_053<tab>Correct me if I am wrong, but are you not the foreigner who went to rather great lengths to expose the archbishop's falsehoods? Responsible for the reevaluation of the entire curriculum?
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_100_053おや……。
もしや貴方は、皇都の歴史を暴いた英雄様では？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_054<tab>Quite the resolution, that. And for what? Every great nation's history is marred by the sins of the past. Ala Mhigo? Ul'dah? Limsa Lominsa? Please. Each was built on a foundation of lies and blood.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_054ハッ、余計なことをしてくれたものだ。
歴史とは、勝者が記述する物語に過ぎない。
理想の実現のために、真実を編集するのは真っ当な方策だ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_055<tab>Which is not to say we elites should not learn from these mistakes. But we who have served as shepherds of the people for a thousand years have a duty to maintain order through the preservation of tradition. Would a wainwright cast aside his father's best cart when it has but a broken wheel?
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_055真実とやらを知り、無秩序な混乱に興じる民衆の姿を見たまえ。
憐れな民衆を救う方法とは、我ら貴族が新たな教義を構築し、
秩序をあたえてやるしかなかろう？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_056<tab>Indeed. Archombadin and I have said as much to those who support a more radical approach. The last thing we need is young seminarians running about crying for reformation.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_056その第一歩が、学院内の混乱を鎮めることです。
寮長は、無用な「点数争い」を防ぐため、
神学生に寮長への協力を呼びかけました。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_057<tab>I see. So you both have been quite active in convincing the other students to see things your way. How have you fared?
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_057……ほう、それは興味深い。
神学生の点数を寮長に集約しようというわけか。
それで、神学生たちの反応は……？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_058<tab>'Tis hardly a daunting task. Many seek comfort in consistency.
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_058<tab>ハッ、我々の影響力をその目で確認する、いい機会があるぞ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_059<tab>Sister Gaetelle has tasked us with bringing back the students who took leave. Why not let our results determine how persuasive we are?
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_059神学生たちには、ここ最近の騒動に心くじけ、
授業に現れなくなった者に対する「復学促進運動」を指示している。
この結果を発表する会を、近く開催するのだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_060<tab>I thank you gentlemen for your cooperation, and wish you the best of luck with your efforts. Now then, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, if these students are bringing back their truant peers, there must be others who are doing the same. Let us split up and seek out the participants.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_060……では、神学生たちは、皇都各地で学友を探しているのだな？
)) (( )) 02 /var>……
手分けして、その様子を見てみるとしよう。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEIGH_000_069<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it's good to see you! Fighting the good fight lately?
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEIGH_000_069<tab>おお、いいところに来てくれた！

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_RYOUMIN2154_000_069<tab>Can't you talk with him another time? I finally got his attention, and I'd rather you not interrupt!
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_RYOUMIN2154_000_069ちょっと取り込み中だから後にしてくれない？
せっかくの彼とのひとときを、邪魔しないでほしいの！

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ULAA_000_069<tab>You too came to hear Crammevoix speak? The wisdom of a scholar with the soul of a poet! When he recites scripture, I just... <sigh>
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ULAA_000_069あなたも、クラムヴォワに用なの？
彼と話すと心が軽くなるわよね……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_069<tab>In addition to preserving the other students' welfare, we prefects also take it upon ourselves to conduct study sessions and volunteer activities, so that all may receive of a rich and fulfilling education.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_069神学生は、寮で共同生活を送ることで、
聖職者としての資質を磨く。
寮長である私は、神学生の生活基盤を掌握しているというわけだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_069<tab>By the grace of the Count de Dzemael was I admitted to the scholasticate, that I might remain by Archombadin's side. He is the sun which shines the light of truth throughout these halls, and I am but the moon which reflects his radiance.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_069本家の当主であらせられるゼーメル伯爵閣下に、
寮長を補佐するよう指示を受け、本学院に入学しました。
寮長が太陽ならば、私は月のようなものなのです。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_THEOMOCENT_000_070<tab>Oh. Hello, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Leigh and I were just about to visit our friends in Foundation and try to convince them to return to their studies.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_THEOMOCENT_000_070)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、また会いましたね。
僕たちは、休学してしまった平民出身の学友たちを、
神学院に呼び戻そうと説得して回っているんです。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEIGH_000_071<tab>It's been difficult since we aren't exactly held in high regard right now. The dormitory prefects have made sure of that.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEIGH_000_071……自分の意思で去った者を、無理に呼び戻してどうなる？
あの腹黒寮長のことだ、どうせこの復学促進運動とやらも、
自分の「点数稼ぎ」に利用するつもりだろうよ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_THEOMOCENT_000_072<tab>We must do all in our power to motivate our friends to come back to the scholasticate. Then we can strive for high marks together.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_THEOMOCENT_000_072それでも今は、自分にできることをやるだけです……。
神学院をとりまく状況を変える意思を持つ同志が、
ひとりでも多くなってくれることが大切ですから！

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEIGH_000_073<tab>Right! And then, we can convince our peers that we are just as worthy as any highborn in the clergy, they will welcome us with open arms, and all will be well in Ishgard! <sigh>
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEIGH_000_073状況を変える意思、か……。
確かに、あの腹黒寮長が教皇庁入りしたら、
間違いなく昔の正教に逆戻りだろうな……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEIGH_000_074<tab>If Archombadin and his cronies receive the scholasticate's endorsement, no one will ever listen to us. We can't let them take the Trinity!
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEIGH_000_074このまま貴族組の好きにさせて、上位三席を独占されりゃ、
貴族と平民を隔てる教えも、残り続けちまうってことか。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_THEOMOCENT_000_075<tab>I would rather not think of it that way, Leigh. Let us just focus on bringing back as many people as we can.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_THEOMOCENT_000_075でも、僕たちに同意してくれる学友が増えれば、
状況を変えられるはずです！
だから、諦めずにがんばりましょう！

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEIGH_000_076<tab>Well, that's how the highborn are thinking about it. The more vocal we become, the more they will see us as a threat. That's why we have to stick together.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEIGH_000_076ったく、テオにはかなわないな。
あいつは正論で突き進むから、貴族に目の敵にされてるんだ。
だから、俺があいつを守るしかないんだ、じゃあな！

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_070<tab>A new <var 08 E905 ((exotic flower)) ((friend of faraway lands)) /var> graces us with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> presence today. Well met, my <var 08 E905 ((dear)) ((good sir)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_070はあ～い、、オレに何か用かな～？
用がないなら、またいつか～。
それとも、一緒に盛り上がる～？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_RYOUMIN2154_000_071<tab>And what am I, chopped liver? Hmph. He was looking at <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> until you showed up!
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_RYOUMIN2154_000_071えー、アタシは、こんなチョコボの骨と一緒なんてごめんよ！
あんた、アタシたちの大切な時間を邪魔しないでくれる！？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_072<tab>Ah, I see. So you are helping Inspector Briardien. A pleasure to meet you. I am Crammevoix de Maintigny, but you may address me simply by my first name.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_072……ふんふん、は、
特別顧問ブリアルディアンのお仲間さんか～。
オレは、毎日が祝祭のクラムヴォワ、よろしくぅ～！

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_073<tab>So what brings you to the Pillars? Could it be you are to observe how we go about convincing truant seminarians to return? Then by all means, let me show you how it is done!
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_073あっ、ひらめいちゃった。
もしや、「点数稼ぎ」を探ってるんでしょ？
ねえ、あたった、あたっちゃった？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ULAA_000_074<tab>I must admit, I find many of the other students rather intimidating, but thanks to Crammevoix, I am considering returning to the scholasticate to resume my studies.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ULAA_000_074その件なら、クラムヴォワは一歩進んでいるわね。
私は神学院になじめないから辞めるつもりだったけれど、
彼の勧めに従って、復学することにしたの。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ULAA_000_075<tab>We were just discussing the responsibility the highborn have to redress the imbalance. “Of the Fury's love will all men receive, and by the balance of Her spear will all be set free.” So it is written in volume eleven of the <var 1A 02 /var>Seventy-two Articles of Halonic Polity<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ULAA_000_075「戦神の愛は、ひとしくすべての民に注がれ、
　戦神の槍は、ひとしくすべての民を裁くものなり」
……「正教法大全11巻」にもこう書いてある。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_076<tab>“Equal under Her ever-watchful gaze.” Ah, would that you graced our halls with your presence once more, that I might favor you with mine own gaze. I fondly recall seeing your lovely face always buried in that tome.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_076ひゅ～、「神の下での、人の平等」を記した一節だね？
神学院では微妙に濁して指導してるけど……。
そういえば君って、いつも熱心に「11巻」を読んでたよねぇ～？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ULAA_000_077<tab>Oh Crammevoix, you <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> notice! I thought to pen a lengthy treatise on it, but I could not make do once the volume vanished.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ULAA_000_077えっ、私があれを愛読していたことに気付いていたの？
で、でも最近、「11巻」は神学院の書棚から消えたのよ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_078<tab>Oh, so you helped Mathye by searching for that tome? With how relevant the content has become these days, I suppose it is not surprising it would go missing...
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_078へぇ～、が、
消えた「正教法大全11巻」の発注を手伝ったんだ？
「11巻」って、ほとんど流通してないって話だけどねぇ……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ULAA_000_079<tab>In any event, you've convinced me. I will gather my things and return to the dormitory straightaway.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ULAA_000_079うふふ、珍しく深刻な顔ね。
人に笑えっていってるあなたがそれじゃ、詐欺よ？
さて、そろそろ私は、神学院に復学を申請しにいくわね。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_080<tab>Yes, that is the way. One must seize the moment and act upon one's convictions. Life is but a fleeting, fragile thing. Wouldn't you agree, my dear?
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_080そう……笑ってれば、何もかもうまくいく。
人は誰でもいつか死ぬ……。
だったら、死ぬまで死ぬ気で楽しんで、毎日を祝祭にしよう！

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_081<tab>Well, I have done my part in guiding a little lamb back to the flock. And now to celebrate with a well-deserved nap. I bid you both farewell.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_081さあて、オレも、今日のところは帰るとしようかな。
それじゃ、まったね～。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_089<tab>We shall announce the results anon.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_089現在、寮長アルションバダンとルブラソワールが、
各学生の活動結果をまとめているところです。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SATURNOIS_000_089<tab>It would seem that Archombadin and Lebrassoir had quite the advantage, given their experience managing the dormitory.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_SATURNOIS_000_089休学中の神学生を復学させるというこの運動も、
寮長とルブラソワールが見事に仕切ってくれています。
ふたりの手腕は、見事なものです……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_089<tab>After reviewing the preliminary numbers at the dormitory, I am looking forward to the results.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_089……戻ったか。
では、そろそろ結果発表を始めるとするか……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_089<tab>If our performance is to be taken into account for the final rankings, then I must say Archombadin and I have nothing to worry about.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_089……特別顧問殿、ちょうどよいところにいらっしゃいました。
そろそろ、「復学促進運動」の集計が終わります。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_THEOMOCENT_000_089<tab>Well, I did everything I could. And even if I did not guide them all myself, I am glad that so many of our peers have come back.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_THEOMOCENT_000_089僕にできることは、全部やりました。
あとは、ひとりでも多くの学友と、
また一緒に学べることを願うばかりです。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEIGH_000_089<tab>(The dormitory rat has quite the smile on his face. Could it be that he was able to gather more students than us?)
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEIGH_000_089腹黒寮長たちのやることだ……。
どうせ、大々的に自分らの成果を自慢するんだろうぜ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_089<tab>With all the young women returning, mayhap I will have more incentive to linger in the library. But I do not see Ulaa...
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_089はあ～い、も来たの？
こうして神学生が集まってると、
お祭りみたいで、気分が盛りあがるよね～？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_JANCHETTE_000_089<tab>Curious about the result? I cannot imagine why. I see no reason to expect anything surprising.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_JANCHETTE_000_089「復学促進運動」の結果が気になりますの？
あまり期待しない方がよろしくてよ。
どうせ、予想を覆す出来事なんて起きませんわ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BLAISIE_000_089<tab>All these people are making me nervous... I mean, I was not able to bring anyone back, so I'm not even part of the competition, but even so, I...I hope that Theo did well.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BLAISIE_000_089ああ……ソワソワしちゃいます……。
なぜって、そろそろ運動の結果が発表されるものですから。
私は成果なしですが、テオモサンは大丈夫かしら……？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_090<tab>Right, then. Let us see how competitive these students truly are.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_090こちらは貴族出身の神学生たちを見ていたが、
君も、いろいろな神学生から話を聞けたようだな。
さて……間もなく復学促進運動の結果が発表されるようだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_091<tab>It brings me joy to see so many of our brothers and sisters returned to the scholasticate. Sister Gaetelle, the floor is yours.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_091神学生の諸君、「復学促進運動」の協力に感謝する。
この度の成果を集計し終えたので、
これより、ガエテル司祭に発表していただく。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_092<tab>Thank you, Archombadin. I will now announce how many of our stray sheep each student persuaded to come home.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_092休学していた神学生たちの復学は、
神学院の立て直しに、大きく貢献する行いだ。
各人の協力に感謝しつつ、結果を発表する！

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_093<tab>Both Theomocent and Leigh were able to bring back one student each. Janchette guided two back into our arms.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_093テオモサン、および、レイの両名が1名ずつ、
ジャンシェトが2名の復学を導いた。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_094<tab>Archombadin and Lebrassoir were each able to convince three students to return, the most of all. Excellent work, all of you.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_094最良の結果を出したのは、それぞれ3名を復学させた、
アルションバダン寮長とルブラソワールの両名。
以上、皆よくやってくれた。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_Q1_000_001<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_Q1_000_001<tab>何か言う？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_A1_000_001<tab>What about the student Crammevoix convinced to return?
target: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_A1_000_001<tab>クラムヴォワも1名復学させたのでは？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_095<tab>Oh, is this true? Are we missing someone from the count?
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_GAETELLE_000_095クラムヴォワも、女生徒を復学させているですって？
それは、何かの間違いでしょう。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_096<tab>Wait, Sister Gaetelle─what about Ulaa? She seemed quite enthusiastic about returning to her studies.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_096おやおや～ガエテル司祭、ちょ～っとお待ちを。
オレも、ウラーを復帰させたはずですよ？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_097<tab>The girl you speak of has formally withdrawn from the scholasticate. Apparently she was not all that enthusiastic about returning as she led Crammevoix to believe. Mayhap she chose to play along so that he would cease his harassment.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_097ハッ、その女生徒……ウラーならば、この度、正式に退学した。
おおかたクラムヴォワの軽口につられて、
彼女が本心と異なる返事を口走ったのだろう。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_098<tab>Perhaps it was for the best. She rarely engaged her fellow students, instead choosing to sit alone and read the <var 1A 02 /var>Articles of Halonic Polity<var 1A 01 /var>. Given the recent revelations, I suspect she became disillusioned with the faith.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_098彼女は、私たち学友に馴染むこともなく、
孤独に「正教法大全」を読むばかりでしたからね。
神学院での学びに興味を失うのも、当然の帰結でしょう。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_099<tab>Strange you would say that, Lebrassoir. When last I spoke with her, Ulaa was quite interested in volume eleven's “Equal under Her ever-watchful gaze” passage─one that you and your master would sooner pretend did not exist. If she were the victim of harassment, I rather expect it was at your hands.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_099おっかしいな～、彼女は本気で戻りたがっていたよ……？
つまりこれは、「誰か」さんが、
「平等」を求めるウラーを追い払った～ってことかな？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_100<tab>Are you implying that we had something to do with it because we did not share her views? What rot! You dishonor yourself and your house with such baseless accusations─rather you would, if aught remained of your house to dishonor.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_100ハッ、ならば、ウラーの動向を見届けなかった貴様の落ち度だ。
貴族とはいえ、領民に命を奪われるような父を持つ男では、
この程度が限界というわけだな。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_101<tab>I yield, good sir, I yield! I lack the <var 1A 02 /var>qualities<var 1A 01 /var> the honorable Lord Archombadin possesses which enable him to deliver such observations. Well, if Ulaa has withdrawn, then I must mourn her departure─by walking through the dormitory halls reciting excerpts from volume eleven.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_101……それ以上、父上を侮辱するのはやめてくれないかな～？
でないとオレ、どうなっちゃうかわからないよ？
さて空気が重苦しいし、「11巻」でも読みにいこうかな～。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_102<tab>And how do you intend to do that? Volume eleven of the <var 1A 02 /var>Articles of Halonic Polity<var 1A 01 /var> has been missing for some time now.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_102お待ちください。
もしや「正教法大全11巻」の行方を知っているのですか？

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_103<tab>The tomes themselves are inconsequential if one has taken the words to heart. How fortunate we are that the wisdom of our forebears is not so easily forgotten, would you not agree?
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_CRAMMEVOIX_000_103へぇ～、ずいぶん「正教法大全11巻」の行方を気にしてるね？
オレ、ひとことも本の題名は言ってないのに。
でも、残念ながら違う本だよ……それじゃね～。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_104<tab>Such impudence as befits a sixth son. For all his failings, his father was wise to send him away.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_ARCHOMBADIN_000_104ハッ、こしゃくなマネを……。
無能な父に神学院に追いやられ、
厄介払いされた六男坊の分際で……。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_105<tab>...At any rate, we are blessed that this handful of truants have returned to us. Truly, it is the Fury's will that we overcome these trials and tribulations, and move forward with a singular vision for the future.
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_LEBRASSOIR_000_105所詮は、品性下劣な血筋ということでしょう。
ともかくほかの方々も、今回の結果をよくよく考え、
聖職者として正しき振る舞いをなさるよう努めてください。

source: TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_106<tab>A student with a keen interest in a controversial precept who withdraws without explanation. This seems rather odd to me as well. Mayhap it is worthy of our attention...
target:
TEXT_CHREND103_02154_BRIARDIEN_000_106「平等」を望んだ神学生の謎めいた自主退学か……。
どうにも引っかかるな……。
きちんと調べた方がよさそうだ。
